device.name: i82576EB_v2
device.desc: model of Intel® i82576EB Gb Ethernet controller
device.limitations:
• Flow Control is unimplemented.
  • Power Management is unimplemented.
  • Load configuration from non-volatile memory is unimplemented.
  • MSI-X is unimplemented.
  • MRQC.RSSInterruptEnable not implemented.
  • Rx replication is not implemented
  • Virtualization is not implemented
  • Low Latency Interrupt filter and rate limiting is not implemented
  • IEEE1588 timestamp is not implemented in L2 EthType filter

register.name: cbtmpc
register.desc: Circuit Breaker TX manage packet count

field.name: sdp2_gpien
field.desc: General Purpose Interrupt Detection Enable for SDP2

field.name: sdp3_gpien
field.desc: General Purpose Interrupt Detection Enable for SDP3

register.name: factps
register.desc: Function Action and Power State to MNG

field.name: nsicr
field.desc: Non selective interrupt clear on read

register.name: htcbdpc
register.desc: Host tx circuit breaker dropped packets count

register.name: htdpmc
register.desc: Host Transmit Discard Packets by MAC Count

field.name: secrc
field.desc: Strip Ethernet CRC from incoming Packet

register.name: rsctfc
register.desc: TCP Segmentation Count Tx Fail Count

field.name: bszhdr
field.desc: RX Buffer size for header buffer

field.name: ptpl2
field.desc: PTP L2 EtherType to Time Stamp

field.name: uport
field.desc: UDP Port Number to Time Stamp

bank.name: io_mapped
bank.documentation: I/O-Mapped Access to Internal Registers and Memory

register.name: dsn_capability_header
register.documentation: Device Serial Number Extended Capability Header

field.name: dlllar
field.desc: Data Link Layer Link Active Reporting Capable

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type (00: anywhere in 32-bit space; 10: anywhere in 64-bit space)

field.name: type
field.documentation: Type (00: anywhere in 32-bit space; 10: anywhere in 64-bit space)

field.name: irortd0
field.desc: Immediate Readiness on Return to D0
